text: Windows CE 5.0 (codename "Macallan")"The History of Windows CE" is the third release of the Windows CE .NET family. It was first released on July 9 2004. Windows CE 5.0 was promoted as a low-cost, small, fast-to-market, real-time operating system. It was available for x86, ARM, MIPS and SuperH based systems. Windows CE 5.0 versions are the base for Windows Mobile 6.0, 6.1 and 6.5. == References == Category:Microsoft Windows software
title: Windows CE 5.0
